title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.7 - Licenses and initial registrations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.7 - Licenses and initial registrations

State Regulations

When the candidate fulfills all requirements for licensure, the department shall issue a first registration certificate and a license. The
first registration shall be for the remainder of the applicable registration
period. Pursuant to section
6502
of the

Education Law the registration fee shall be prorated for those persons newly
licensed and registered, or reactivating registration, during the second or
third year of a registration period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
59.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
